properties.description: Did after Maheers lesson on 18th June

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductAlternateKey as string,
		ProductSubcategoryKey as integer,
		WeightUnitMeasureCode as string,
		SizeUnitMeasureCode as string,
		EnglishProductName as string,
		SpanishProductName as integer,
		FrenchProductName as integer,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		FinishedGoodsFlag as boolean,
		Color as string,
		SafetyStockLevel as short,
		ReorderPoint as short,
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		SizeRange as integer,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		DaysToManufacture as integer,
		ProductLine as string,
		DealerPrice as integer,
		Class as string,
		Style as string,
		ModelName as integer,
		LargePhoto as integer,
		EnglishDescription as integer,
		FrenchDescription as integer,
		ChineseDescription as integer,
		ArabicDescription as integer,
		HebrewDescription as integer,
		ThaiDescription as integer,
		GermanDescription as integer,
		JapaneseDescription as integer,
		TurkishDescription as integer,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp,
		Status as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: '\nSELECT \n      [ProductNumber]as [ProductAlternateKey]\n      ,PS.[ProductSubcategoryID] as [ProductSubcategoryKey]\n      ,[WeightUnitMeasureCode] as [WeightUnitMeasureCode]\n      ,[SizeUnitMeasureCode] as [SizeUnitMeasureCode]\n      ,P.[Name] as [EnglishProductName]\n      ,NULL as [SpanishProductName]\n      ,NULL as [FrenchProductName]\n      ,[StandardCost]\n      , [FinishedGoodsFlag] \n	        ,[Color] as [Color]\n      ,[SafetyStockLevel]as [SafetyStockLevel]\n      ,[ReorderPoint] as [ReorderPoint]\n      ,[ListPrice] as [ListPrice]\n      ,[Size]\n      ,NULL as [SizeRange]\n      ,[Weight]\n      ,[DaysToManufacture]\n      ,[ProductLine]\n      ,NULL as [DealerPrice]\n      ,[Class]\n      ,[Style]\n      ,NULL as [ModelName]\n      ,NULL as [LargePhoto]\n      ,NULL as [EnglishDescription]\n      ,NULL as [FrenchDescription]\n      ,NULL as [ChineseDescription]\n      ,NULL as [ArabicDescription]\n      ,NULL as [HebrewDescription]\n      ,NULL as [ThaiDescription]\n      ,NULL as [GermanDescription]\n      ,NULL as [JapaneseDescription]\n      ,NULL as [TurkishDescription]\n      ,[SellStartDate] as [StartDate]\n      ,[SellEndDate] as [EndDate]\n      ,NULL as [Status]\n  FROM [dbo].[Product] P\n  LEFT join [dbo].[ProductSubcategory] PS ON P.[ProductSubcategoryID]=PS.[ProductSubcategoryID]',
	format: 'query') ~> sourceProduct
source(output(
		ProductAlternateKey as string,
		Color as string,
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as double,
		EndDate as timestamp,
		Status as string,
		iscurrent as boolean,
		Last_Modified_Date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: '\nSELECT \n      [ProductAlternateKey]\n	   ,[Color]\n      ,[ListPrice]\n      ,[Size]\n      ,[Weight]\n	  ,[EndDate]\n      ,[Status]\n      ,[iscurrent]\n      ,[Last_Modified_Date]\n  FROM [dbo].[DimProduct]',
	format: 'query') ~> sourceDimProduct
sourceProduct, sourceDimProduct lookup(sourceProduct@ProductAlternateKey == sourceDimProduct@ProductAlternateKey,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookuponDimProduct
